means: 冬，冬天，冬季( winter的名词复数 )
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 温特斯取自父名，来源于Winter,含义是“温特之子”(son of Winter)

sentence.Network_en: The plant will stand all but the worst winters out of doors.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了最严寒的冬季，这种植物都能在户外生长。

sentence.Network_en: If your ship doesn't come in, swim out to it.--Jonathan Winters
sentence.Network_cn: 如果你等的船没有向你驶来，那你就朝它游过去吧。

sentence.Network_en: I don't know how poor people got through those cold winters.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不知道穷人们是怎样熬过那些寒冬的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Summers are warm , not hot , and winters are brisk rather than freezing ., 夏天暖而不热 , 冬天则凉爽而不寒冷.
The coastal areas have mild winters , but by contrast the central plains become extremely cold ., 沿海地区的冬天天气暖和 , 可是相比之下中部平原却异常寒冷.
winterresident 冬留鸟, winters 文达士, winterrye 秋黑麦
of central North America ; winters in Texas and the south Mississippi valley ., 产于北美洲中部 ; 冬天生活在得克萨斯和南密西西比河谷地带.

list.abs: 农业专业英语词汇(U-Z) ... winter catch crop 冬季填闲罪 winter cherry 酸浆 winter cress 山芥.
西餐英文_百度文库 ... 芦笋 asparagus 冬瓜 winter melon 菠菜 spinach.
vacation是什么意思？_百度知道 ... on vacation 在度假中 winter vacation 寒假 long vacation 大学暑假；法院夏季休庭.
仓木麻衣的歌曲 - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... 233-247 Always 等（总是） 259-270 Winter Bells 冬天的铃铛 521-529 Revive 复苏.
做名侦探柯南PPT用什么音乐好_百度知道 ... destiny 命运 Winter Bells 冬日铃铛 Growing of my heart 成长的心.

entry.def: Winter is the season between autumn and spring. In the winter the weather is usually cold.

example.ex: In winter the nights are long and cold.

entry.def: If an animal or plant winters somewhere or is wintered there, it spends the winter there.

example.ex: The birds will winter outside in an aviary...
example.tran: 鸟儿们将在外面的大鸟笼里过冬。

example.ex: The young seedlings are usually wintered in a cold frame.
example.tran: 幼苗通常都会放在冷床里越冬。

entry.def: If you winter somewhere, you spend the winter there.

example.ex: The family decided to winter in Nice again.
example.tran: 一家人决定还是到尼斯过冬。

auth_sentence.content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The winters are cold but generally dry and sunny.

auth_sentence.content: That's a problem. Hotter summers, colder winters.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's a problem. Hotter summers, colder winters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's a problem. Hotter summers, colder winters.

auth_sentence.content: Historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Historically, so-called volcanic winters have caused catastrophic famines.
